description: Gets the contents of the specified Amazon Web Services Systems Manager document (SSM document).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date the SSM document was created.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the SSM document. This value can differ for each version of the document. If you want to update this value, see  UpdateDocument.

nested_items.name: VersionName
nested_items.description: The version of the artifact associated with the document. For example, 12.6. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and can't be changed.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The document version.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the SSM document, such as Creating, Active, Updating, Failed, and Deleting.

nested_items.name: StatusInformation
nested_items.description: A message returned by Amazon Web Services Systems Manager that explains the Status value. For example, a Failed status might be explained by the StatusInformation message, 'The specified S3 bucket doesn't exist. Verify that the URL of the S3 bucket is correct.'

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The contents of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: DocumentType
nested_items.description: The document type.

nested_items.name: DocumentFormat
nested_items.description: The document format, either JSON or YAML.

nested_items.name: Requires
nested_items.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The document version required by the current document.

nested_items.name: RequireType
nested_items.description: The document type of the required SSM document.

nested_items.name: VersionName
nested_items.description: An optional field specifying the version of the artifact associated with the document. For example, 12.6. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and can't be changed.

nested_items.name: AttachmentsContent
nested_items.description: A description of the document attachments, including names, locations, sizes, and so on.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of an attachment.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The size of an attachment in bytes.

nested_items.name: Hash
nested_items.description: The cryptographic hash value of the document content.

nested_items.name: HashType
nested_items.description: The hash algorithm used to calculate the hash value.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL location of the attachment content.

nested_items.name: ReviewStatus
nested_items.description: The current review status of a new custom Systems Manager document (SSM document) created by a member of your organization, or of the latest version of an existing SSM document.
